name: NewsMax
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This flash briefing provides the lates news on all topics from your favourite source, News Max. Available whenever you ask Alexa for the Flash briefing. We are working to update our content frequently. If you want more news got newsmax.tv
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
